author: Bloomberg
title: Lockdown’s success in China offers hope for world’s virus fight
description: New cases of the virus transmitting within the country dropped to zero about eight weeks after the government’s massive quarantine of some 60 million people in Hubei province. Now, with the lockdown on the virus’s epicenter in Wuhan due to be lifted on April …
content:
By Naomi Kresge and Samuel DodgeAs lockdowns spread across the U.S., the U.K. and other countries, early lessons on how effective they’ll be against the new coronavirus are coming from abroad. 
Trains carrying workers back to work after two months in locked-… [+3233 chars]
